Built on the best open source technology: Built on the best open source technology, elementary is an extremely developer-friendly platform. We provide existing and prospective developers the best available resources and documentation to ensure that your apps really shine.
Read the Human Interface Guidelines (HIG: Read the Human Interface Guidelines (HIG) and learn how to make your app a first-class experience.
Learn about our Application Programming: Learn about our Application Programming Interface (APIs), and discover all the built-in technologies available to you.
Use Launchpad to manage bug reports and: Launchpad के मदद से Bug Reports का प्रबंध करे अौर अन्य Developers के साथ सहयोग करे।
Set up an Ubuntu My Apps account and pub: Ubuntu My Apps पर अपना खाता बानाये अौर अपने Apps, Software Center पे प्रकाशित करे।
Develop Apps for elementary OS: elementary OS के लिए ऐप्स का विकास करें
